ProjectTitle: Catalytic and solid state NMR spectroscopic study of bimetallic  catalysts: synergisms between Lewis acid and transition metal sites  in carbonylation and transfer hydrocyanation reactions
InitialFeedbackHistory:
25/07/2022
Have you considered which repositories to use for data preservation and sharing? If there are disciplinary repositories in your field sharing there increases the findability and impact of your data, but if these are not available you can use the KU Leuven repository RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr, you can apply access restrictions if needed but others can easily find your data thanks to the metadata and the DIO that RDR assigns and colleagues can request access via RDR.
label: good with suggestions
